note:
Looking forward to a "more perfect union", and a reinterpretation of our "well regulated militia" currently gunning us down. The US needs rank-choice voting to end extremism... which will also end the 2-party system.

Always a "them", never an "us".

Don't "favorite", "boost" posts you like! "Favoriting" a post is saying: between you and the author, you want them to know you liked, but not let anybody else know. "Boosting" means you liked it and want to let others know.
